Title: RBI approves HDFC Bank Group's plans to acquire 9.50% 'aggregate holding' in IndusInd Bank
Description: HDFC Bank Group must acquire a major shareholding in IndusInd Bank within one year, and ensure that its aggregate holding does not exceed 9.50 percent at any time.
